Question: Which characters are central to the storyline of 'Son of Chucky'?
Options:
A. Chucky
B. Son of Chucky
C. Glen or Glenda
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the characters and themes in *Son of Chucky*?
Options:
A. a) Chucky is the father of the main character in Son of Chucky.
B. b) The son of Chucky is a significant character in the film.
C. c) Michael Myers, Jason Voorhees, and Freddy Krueger are referenced in the context of horror villains becoming less scary.
D. d) All of the above
